ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'FP_Contact', ISPICKVAL(Account.Record_Country__c, 'Philippines')), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Phone)), OR( NOT(REGEX(Phone,"^((\\+63)?\\d{8,10})?$")), NOT(REGEX(Phone, "\\+[0-9 ]+")) ), NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(MobilePhone)), OR( NOT(REGEX(MobilePhone,"^((\\+63)?\\d{8,10})?$")), NOT(REGEX(MobilePhone, "\\+[0-9 ]+")) ), NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(OtherPhone)), OR( NOT(REGEX(OtherPhone,"^((\\+63)?\\d{8,10})?$")), NOT(REGEX(OtherPhone, "\\+[0-9 ]+")) ), NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) ) ) , false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add phone in the right format. It should start with +63 and be followed by 8 to 10 digits, without space
